scout.description: Egale Eyes. can see futher, move and scout faster. But scavanges less.

medic.description: Keep your team alive. Heals faster and heals more health for each med.

builder.description: Construction expert. Can carry more resources, can build faster and cheaper (building W.I.P).

soldier.description: Master at combat. Has more health and deals more damage in combat (combat W.I.P).
